title: ils的伤害问题
txt_content: 如题，ils装上去，即使玩家几千，几万血，都会因为掉落伤害，燃烧，饥饿而一下子掉完，如何解决掉这个bug版本1.7.10  Thermos端

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
ils的config里面找到:
把数值全部设置为0即可
environmentalDamage:
  block_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  cactus:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  drowning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fall:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire_tick:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  lava:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  lightning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  magic:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  poison:
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 0
  starvation:
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  damage:
    durabilityLost: 1

replies.author: 狗贼sama
replies.txt_content:
ils配置里 找到关于掉落伤害 燃烧的
然后将受伤造成百分比调成0
完美解决
